channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning & Data Science on Volak Sin

item.title: Workers' Compensation Claim Severity Analysis
item.description: Created an analysis methodology to help predict future workers’ compensation claim severities Engineered features from (add more feature engineering here) text to to improve model performance Applied LASSO linear regression, Random Forest, and optimized XGBoost hyperparameters using cross validation SUMMARY & INSIGHTS The project task involved analyzing workers’ compensation claim level loss experience. As with most insurance experience, the distribution of claim severities was highly skewed with a max claim amount of $3.

item.title: The Secret Behind Warren Buffet's Words
item.description: Warren Buffet is arguably the greatest investor of all time. He is so revered among investors and shareholders that his annual stockholders’ meeting is filled up with stadiums of people; all waiting to hear what the chairman has to say. We took that interest in Warren’s words one step further. We will analyze every word that Warren has written in Berkshire’s annual report and try to make future predictions off them.
